participant_1.background:
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
i am twenty five years old.

participant_2.background:
My parents were immigrants from Italy.
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
I have a wide range of musical tastes and enjoy listening to different genres depending on my mood.
i love soccer.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! Just got back from volunteering at my local animal shelter.
That is so great! I love animals so much. What type of animals do they have at the shelter?
They have cats, dogs, rabbits, and guinea pigs. I mostly work with the cats because I love cats.
Aw, I love cats too! I have a black lab named Bear.
That's awesome! I love black labs.
Yeah, he's my best friend. He's always there to greet me when I get home from work.
That sounds so nice. I wish I had a dog.
You should get one! They're the best companions.
